DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , double-blinded , double-dummy , active-controlled , randomize , Phase III clinical trial evaluate efficacy safety DA-6034 demonstrate non-inferiority DA-6034 compare Rebamipide patient acute chronic gastritis . Subjects receive 45mg , 90mg DA-6034 300mg Rebamipide , two tablet , three time day two week .
